description: After trying so many wiritng related applications, finally I found this. Exactly the tool I needed to write my book, with the structure, looks and functions I was looking for. Thank you!

I love the app. It has been my go to writing app. It has every thing I need to plan out a short story or novel. Unfortunately there are two problems. After the last update the flatpak app crashes whenever you try to save something which makes the app useless. The other problem is that the saved file formats between the flatpak and the Fedora native app are incompatible. Neither will open files created in the other.

Please fix these problems. I really need to use the app again.

Will not run when selecting from the menu. If I try from the CLI, I get the following error:
"Qt: Session management error: Could not open network socket"
Then I have to press CTRL-Z to quit it. 
This app does nothing, I assume there is a missing component or dependency.
Эта обнавленная версия работоспособная. Начал в ней писать. Осваиваю функционал. Обним словом молодцы!
